EnhancedContent: As far as I know, after a normal download, it should show Installed.However, every time the download progress bar completes, it reverts back to Downloading.I've been trying to fix this for two days now, but it's still not working.
Title: Unable to download Windows system language pack
Description: As far as I know, after a normal download, it should show Installed.However, every time the download progress bar completes, it reverts back to Downloading.I've been trying to fix this for two days now, but it's still not working.
Author: Stonehu
